content:
Matrix3x2 Struct

Definition

Represents a 3x2 matrix.

In this Article

public struct Matrix3x2 : IEquatable<System.Numerics.Matrix3x2>
Inheritance
Object
System.ValueType
Matrix3x2

Constructors

Matrix3x2(Single,Single,Single,Single,Single,Single)

Creates a 3x2 matrix from the specified components.

public Matrix3x2 (float m11, float m12, float m21, float m22, float m31, float m32);
m11
Single

The value to assign to the first element in the first row.

m12
Single

The value to assign to the second element in the first row.

m21
Single

The value to assign to the first element in the second row.

m22
Single

The value to assign to the second element in the second row.

m31
Single

The value to assign to the first element in the third row.

m32
Single

The value to assign to the second element in the third row.

Fields

M11

The first element of the first row.

public float M11;

M12

The second element of the first row.

public float M12;

M21

The first element of the second row.

public float M21;

M22

The second element of the second row.

public float M22;

M31

The first element of the third row.

public float M31;

M32

The second element of the third row.

public float M32;

Properties

Identity

Gets the multiplicative identity matrix.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 Identity { get; }
Value
Matrix3x2

The multiplicative identify matrix.

IsIdentity

Indicates whether the current matrix is the identity matrix.

public bool IsIdentity { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the current matrix is the identity matrix; otherwise, false.

Translation

Gets or sets the translation component of this matrix.

public System.Numerics.Vector2 Translation { get; set; }
Value
Vector2

The translation component of the current instance.

Methods

Add(Matrix3x2,Matrix3x2)

Adds each element in one matrix with its corresponding element in a second matrix.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 Add (System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 value1, System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 value2);
value1
Matrix3x2

The first matrix.

value2
Matrix3x2

The second matrix.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The matrix that contains the summed values of value1 and value2.

Creates a rotation matrix using the given rotation in radians.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateRotation (float radians);
radians
Single

The amount of rotation, in radians.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The rotation matrix.

CreateRotation(Single,Vector2)

Creates a rotation matrix using the specified rotation in radians and a center point.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateRotation (float radians, System.Numerics.Vector2 centerPoint);
radians
Single

The amount of rotation, in radians.

centerPoint
Vector2

The center point.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The rotation matrix.

CreateScale(Vector2)

Creates a scaling matrix from the specified vector scale.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateScale (System.Numerics.Vector2 scales);
scales
Vector2

The scale to use.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The scaling matrix.

CreateScale(Single)

Creates a scaling matrix that scales uniformly with the given scale.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateScale (float scale);
scale
Single

The uniform scale to use.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The scaling matrix.

CreateScale(Vector2,Vector2)

Creates a scaling matrix from the specified vector scale with an offset from the specified center point.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateScale (System.Numerics.Vector2 scales, System.Numerics.Vector2 centerPoint);
scales
Vector2

The scale to use.

centerPoint
Vector2

The center offset.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The scaling matrix.

CreateScale(Single,Vector2)

Creates a scaling matrix that scales uniformly with the specified scale with an offset from the specified center.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateScale (float scale, System.Numerics.Vector2 centerPoint);
scale
Single

The uniform scale to use.

centerPoint
Vector2

The center offset.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The scaling matrix.

CreateScale(Single,Single)

Creates a scaling matrix from the specified X and Y components.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateScale (float xScale, float yScale);
xScale
Single

The value to scale by on the X axis.

yScale
Single

The value to scale by on the Y axis.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The scaling matrix.

CreateScale(Single,Single,Vector2)

Creates a scaling matrix that is offset by a given center point.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateScale (float xScale, float yScale, System.Numerics.Vector2 centerPoint);
xScale
Single

The value to scale by on the X axis.

yScale
Single

The value to scale by on the Y axis.

centerPoint
Vector2

The center point.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The scaling matrix.

CreateSkew(Single,Single)

Creates a skew matrix from the specified angles in radians.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateSkew (float radiansX, float radiansY);

Single

The X angle, in radians.

radiansY
Single

The Y angle, in radians.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The skew matrix.

CreateSkew(Single,Single,Vector2)

Creates a skew matrix from the specified angles in radians and a center point.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateSkew (float radiansX, float radiansY, System.Numerics.Vector2 centerPoint);
radiansX
Single

The X angle, in radians.

radiansY
Single

The Y angle, in radians.

centerPoint
Vector2

The center point.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The skew matrix.

CreateTranslation(Vector2)

Creates a translation matrix from the specified 2-dimensional vector.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateTranslation (System.Numerics.Vector2 position);

Vector2

The translation position.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The translation matrix.

CreateTranslation(Single,Single)

Creates a translation matrix from the specified X and Y components.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 CreateTranslation (float xPosition, float yPosition);
xPosition
Single

The X position.

yPosition
Single

The Y position.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The translation matrix.

Equals(Matrix3x2)

Returns a value that indicates whether this instance and another 3x2 matrix are equal.

public bool Equals (System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 other);
other
Matrix3x2

The other matrix.

Returns
Boolean

true if the two matrices are equal; otherwise, false.

Remarks

Two matrices are equal if all their corresponding elements are equal.

Equals(Object)

Returns a value that indicates whether this instance and a specified object are equal.

public override bool Equals (object obj);
obj
Object

The object to compare with the current instance.

Returns
Boolean

true if the current instance and obj are equal; otherwise, false```. If <code>obj</code> isnull, the method returnsfalse`.

Remarks

The current instance and obj are equal if obj is a Matrix3x2 object and the corresponding elements of each matrix are equal.

GetDeterminant()

Calculates the determinant for this matrix.

public float GetDeterminant ();
Returns
Single

The determinant.

Remarks

The determinant is calculated by expanding the matrix with a third column whose values are (0,0,1).

GetHashCode()

Returns the hash code for this instance.

public override int GetHashCode ();
Returns
Int32

The hash code.

Invert(Matrix3x2,Matrix3x2)

Inverts the specified matrix. The return value indicates whether the operation succeeded.

public static bool Invert (System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 matrix, out System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 result);
matrix
Matrix3x2

The matrix to invert.

result
Matrix3x2

When this method returns, contains the inverted matrix if the operation succeeded.

Returns
Boolean

true if matrix was converted successfully; otherwise, false.

Lerp(Matrix3x2,Matrix3x2,Single)

Performs a linear interpolation from one matrix to a second matrix based on a value that specifies the weighting of the second matrix.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 Lerp (System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 matrix1, System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 matrix2, float amount);
matrix1
Matrix3x2

The first matrix.

matrix2
Matrix3x2

The second matrix.

amount
Single

The relative weighting of matrix2.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The interpolated matrix.

Returns the matrix that results from multiplying two matrices together.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 Multiply (System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 value1, System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 value2);
value1
Matrix3x2

The first matrix.

value2
Matrix3x2

The second matrix.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The product matrix.

Multiply(Matrix3x2,Single)

Returns the matrix that results from scaling all the elements of a specified matrix by a scalar factor.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 Multiply (System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 value1, float value2);
value1
Matrix3x2

The matrix to scale.

value2
Single

The scaling value to use.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The scaled matrix.

Negate(Matrix3x2)

Negates the specified matrix by multiplying all its values by -1.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 Negate (System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 value);
value
Matrix3x2

The matrix to negate.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The negated matrix.

Subtract(Matrix3x2,Matrix3x2)

Subtracts each element in a second matrix from its corresponding element in a first matrix.

public static System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 Subtract (System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 value1, System.Numerics.Matrix3x2 value2);
value1
Matrix3x2

The first matrix.

value2
Matrix3x2

The second matrix.

Returns
Matrix3x2

The matrix containing the values that result from subtracting each element in value2 from its corresponding element in value1.

ToString()

Returns a string that represents this matrix.

public override string ToString ();
Returns
String

The string representation of this matrix.

Remarks

The numeric values in the returned string are formatted by using the conventions of the current culture. For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as { {M11:1.1 M12:1.2} {M21:2.1 M22:2.2} {M31:3.1 M32:3.2} }.

Boolean
